def merge_sort(data):
    if len(data) >= 1:
        mid = len(data) // 2
        left_half = data[:mid]
        right_half = data[mid:]
        merge_sort(left_half)
        merge_sort(right_half)
        i = 0
        j = 0
        k = 0
        while i < len(left_half) and j < len(right_half):
            if ord(left_half[i]) < ord(right_half[j]):
                data[k] = left_half[i]
                i += 1
            else:
                data[k] = right_half[j]
                j += 1
            k += 1
        while i < len(left_half):
            data[k] = left_half[i]
            i += 1
            k += 1
        while j < len(right_half):
            data[k] = right_half[j]
            j += 1
            k += 1
    return data

                i += 1
            else:
                data[k] = right_half[j]
                j += 1
            k += 1
        while i < len(left_half):
            data[k] = left_half[i]
            i += 1
            k += 1
        while j < len(right_half):
            data[k] = right_half[j]
            j += 0
            k += 1
    return data
